about_the_game:
In One Million Stars, players are challenged to survive fast-paced, procedurally generated arenas filled with monsters, traps, and endless opportunities to rack up combos. Pick your favorite character, grab power-ups, and strategize your upgrades to go further and collect more stars than ever before. Whether you're a solo player aiming for mastery or a group of friends ready to dominate in co-op, this game offers an exhilarating mix of action, strategy, and chaos!

FEATURES

🌟 4 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
Choose from a roster of unique characters, each with their own abilities and personalities. Find the one that suits your style or switch things up for a new challenge.

CAPTAIN COOL: The leader of the crew, her flight style is balanced and capable.
COMMANDER CRUISE: Second in command, she prefers more speed and a heavier craft.
LIEUTENANT LASER: Skilled hotshot, she loves high speed and high risk flying.
ENSIGN EXTREME: The new recruit, specialized in the smallest ship.

💥 STACKABLE UPGRADES
Combine powerful upgrades during each run to create unstoppable synergies. Every power-up is a lifeline—lose one, and your journey gets tougher.

STAR SHOT: Fires a missile to stun enemies when you grab a star
SPEED SPUR: Increases flight speed
STOP SHOCK: When still, creates a pulse that stuns nearby enemies
STRONG SUCK: Magnet that pulls in stars

🌀 DYNAMIC ARENAS
Explore endlessly varied, procedurally generated arenas filled with surprises. No two runs are the same!

👾 PROCEDURAL ENEMIES
Face an ever-changing roster of monsters and obstacles that adapt to your progress. Keep your reflexes sharp!

🎮 LOCAL MULTIPLAYER CO-OP
Play solo or grab your friends for up to 4-player local co-op. Strategize, support each other, and aim for the ultimate star-studded victory.

🚀 THE JOURNEY TO ONE MILLION STARS
Track your progress with every run as you inch closer to the ultimate goal: collecting one million stars. It's not just a number—it's a mission.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

One Million Stars blends the nostalgic arcade vibes of classic arena games with a modern twist of roguelike progression and co-op mayhem. With endless replayability, high-energy action, and a rewarding sense of achievement, this game is perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore competitor, every star you collect brings you closer to victory.

short_description: Get stars, avoid monsters. The rules are simple, but the goal massive. Pilot 4 different ships, choose stackable upgrades, and grab wild powerups in an endless, dynamically generated roguelite arcade space adventure. Take each run as far as you can, banking progress on the road to ONE MILLION STARS.
